chatgpt_solution:
To compute $95^2$ in my head, I can square the difference between $95$ and $100$ and then subtract this result from $100^2$. 

The difference between $95$ and $100$ is $100-95=5$, so squaring this result gives $5^2=25$. 

Then, subtracting this result from $100^2=10,000$, we have $10,000-25=\boxed{9,975}$.
